title: Robot-Assisted Project-Based English Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Communication Skills and Understanding of Middle School-Level Mathematics Concepts
context.additional_context: Project involving explaining mathematical problem-solving processes in English through interaction with robots. Blended learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: The learner creates a 3-minute presentation explaining the mathematical problem-solving process in English.
The learner performs a role-play using 20 math-related terms in context-specific scenarios through dialogue with a robot.
Through group projects, the learner produces and presents one video explaining math concepts (with English subtitles).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
